name: Vishakha Sadhwani
tagline: Sr. Solutions Architect at NVIDIA, cloud educator, and top 1% LinkedIn influencer
bio: Vishakha Sadhwani is a Senior Solutions Architect at NVIDIA and former Sr. Cloud Architect at Google Cloud. She's a top 1% LinkedIn influencer with 72K+ followers, specializing in AI infrastructure, cloud computing, and DevOps mentorship. Known for her weekly newsletter and daily content on cloud careers.
